main: RS School is free-of-charge and community-based education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes developer community since 2013.
main2: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence.
main3: The mentors and trainers of our school are front-end and javascript developers from different companies and countries
project: This project is a final task for a react course of RS School
graphqli: GraphiQL is a playground/IDE for graphQL requests.
create: This project was created by Elijah-I, AntonSkalaban and foxnorth228
reps: You can find our repositories in the footer of this site
